and weave it into the stitch to finish 4 / 6 ©2021 nioknits keito s jeans doll clothes may 13 2021 make the left leg round1 refer to how to knit the first round my blog ◇ using 3 0mmdpns distribute the 26sts from scrap yarn onto 3dpns it is in the order of 9 8 9 clockwise from the crotch ◇pick up 4sts from the crotch with new yarn leave 10cm yarn tail for closing hole using a crochet hook makes it easy ◇join the crotch stitch and left leg stitch knit using the dpn that picked up the crotch stitches 1 follow the sinker loop of the first stitch of the leftdpn to the right and pick up the loop from the back with the leftdpn 2 knit the first stitch of the leftdpn and the stitch picked up together same as k2tog and knit 8sts on the same needle ◇next needle k8 ◇next needle k8 sl1k ◇join the left leg stitch and crotch stitch 1 yarn-tail is put out to the outside 2 find the yarn that across under the first stitch in the next needle 3 insert crochet hook from under the yarn and pick up the working yarn 4 twist the stitch and move to the rightdpn 5 and then cover the it with the slipped stitch and knit 2 stitches toward the center of the crotch ◇put a marker attach if necessary round2 k30 pull the yarn-tail to prevent the stitch from loosening round3 k30 round4 k30 round5 k30 round6 k30 round7 k30 round8 k30 round9 k28 k2tog round10 ssk k27 round11 k28 round12 k26
